channel.title: pic on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in pic on Barefoot Rob

item.title: walk twelve: brick fishtank
item.description:
06:32 Thursday 30 August 2018 JST I heard some water trickling and noticed a fountain flowing into a basin made of bricks. There were a couple fish inside, effectively making it a brick fishtank.
The sky was overcast so not too hot. Oh, today was the day I walked across part of the dirt lot and up into the back corner area. I didn’t think to take pics while on the inside, but I might go again.

item.title: Lins car hit by motorbike guys shoulder
item.description: 22:47 Wednesday 11 October 2017 JST I am at a hospital with Lin after a little fender bender involving a guy’s shoulder hitting her mirror hard enough to cut her hand as the glass shattered into her open window. The police officer came and suggested it will be easiest/cheapest overall if they don’t sue each other and just do 50⁄50 blame and call it in to their respective insurance companies.

item.title: second time I gave blood in Japan
Ted has started coming back inside
